name: Hitmontop
description: The Handstand Pokémon. Hitmontop spins on its head at high speed, all the while delivering kicks. This technique is a remarkable mix of both offense and defense at the same time. The Pokémon travels faster spinning than it does walking.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.description: Once per short rest, you can impose disadvantage on an enemy attack roll of your choice.

abilities.name: Technician
abilities.description: For damaging moves activated by this Pokémon with 15 max PP or more, they may roll the damage twice and choose either total.

abilities.name: Steadfast
abilities.description: Once per long rest, when this Pokémon fails a saving throw against a negative condition, it can choose to pass instead.
